Description.Text: Comfort Suites Porte de Geneve is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in Annemasse. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location near Annemasse train station. Annemasse is a small city straddling the Franco-Swiss border. It serves as a major commuter area for Geneva, where a large proportion of the population works. Regional places of interest include the River Foron and central Geneva. The hotel is housed in a 21st-century mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Studios are 23sqm and decorated in a modern style with warm tones, carpeted floors and large windows. They feature a kitchenette. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Every studio contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
